title: lol, found out why everyone says nerf kha
body: Kha is OP as shit in 1v1 situations sometimes worse, my go so much fun though

replies.body:
> Kha is OP as %%%% in 1v1 situations sometimes worse, my go so much fun though

Well I hope so considering his kit is pretty much set to 1v1.

> Meanwhile Irelia...{{champion:39}}

Don't worry she is my fave top laner, she is lost but not forgotten by all

> > Meanwhile Irelia...{{champion:39}}
> 
> Don't worry she is my fave top laner, she is lost but not forgotten by all

Don't even worry. I'll be getting Irelia when I have the chance to but I'm more interested in Talon currently.
I noticed when i scored a cheeky double, mid game kill one kill the other basically 2 shotting squishies, but early game kha is weak (even in the jg)

hardly weak. you just do the normal clear atm, gromp or krug, buff, small camp, another small camp with smite usually wolves if started red side, or wraiths when started blue side. if wraiths, scout for a ward before going B imo.
or if enough health after red go for a gank but without the scout it could be pointless and you lose time and xp.
after that, go B and get jungle item of choice and a pink ward imo. then take 2nd buff and a small camp. start small camp (gromp) if going for blue, or start red then wraiths if its up. then go for a gank.

after that you just do the normal clear starting from gromp or krugs, skipping the 3rd camp and turning around after the 4th camp (krug or gromp depending on direction) going to base as necessary, looking for ganks and getting the river buff when possible. after the 2nd round of buffs, look for an opening bot lane to either push the enemy out of the lane or kill them, then request atleast a 3 man dragon. with a melee support you can easily take max 2-3 shots from dragon with correct juggling aggro. from there its basically mid game for kha....

2 vs 1 he does good too.

he doesnt even need to be fed, just needs to zone correctly and position correctly in almost any 2 vs 1 situation to come out on top. and god forbid he kills one of the two....because he will almost surely kill the 2nd.
